item.title: Plastic Pyrolysis
item.description: Transforming plastic into fuel sounds like science fiction, but pyrolysis is already making it a reality!

item.title: QuickFix: Ceramic Capacitor on my Motherboard
item.description: When a tiny capacitor fails spectacularly, does it mean the end of your motherboard? Not if you’re ready to fix it yourself!

item.title: Copperplating
item.description: Imagine turning ordinary objects into gleaming copper creations. The process is simpler than you expect â€“ and the results are stunning!

item.title: Wonder of Crystals: Exploring the Wonders of Growth and Formation
item.description: Explore the mesmerizing world of crystal growth and see how simple chemical substances can create stunning natural patterns.
